verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
So set a fire down in my soul
That I can't contain and
I can't control
I want more of You God,
I want more of You God!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
There's no place I'd rather be
There's no place I'd rather be
There's no place I'd rather be
Than here in your love, here in your love
